title: Voyageurs National Park: Partners
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Partners            Partners          Voyageurs National Park Association In 1965, Voyageurs National Park Association (VNPA) was formed to work for the creation of Voyageurs National Park. VNPA provides travel grants to connect students to the park, manages a Land Preservation Initiative to help willing sellers transfer private property to park ownership, and organizes and annual Volunteer Rendezvous         The Heart of the Continent The Heart of the Continent (HOCP) is a Canadian/American coalition of land managers and local stakeholders working together on cross-border projects that promote the economic, cultural and natural health of the lakes, forests, and communities on the Minnesota/Ontario border.         Places to go adjacent to the park Let Destination Voyageurs National Park assist you in finding local lodging, dining, shopping, attractions and special events during your visit to Northern Minnesota and Voyageurs National Park.
